articles.title: Improved data filtering and comparison on Performance reports
articles.description:
This post describes a new way to filter data on the Search Console Performance reports: regular expressions, or regex. This will allow users
 to create more complex query and page based filters and answer more questions that interest them.
articles.content:
Wednesday, April 07, 2021
